actions.name: Minus
actions.description: Effect: If there is at least one other allied creature with the Plus, Cationic or Anionic Ability on the field, the user's SPATK stat is increased by 50%. If the user is within range of an ally with the Plus, Cationic, or Anionic Ability, they gain the effect of that Ability.
